Our Story

Wireless Without Barriers

We believe everyone deserves reliable, affordable connectivity—regardless of credit score or contract history.

Our Mission

To make premium wireless accessible to everyone, eliminating the barriers that keep people disconnected.

Core Values

What We Stand For

Affordability

Premium wireless shouldn't cost a fortune. We keep prices low so you keep more money.

$480 avg. yearly savings

Inclusivity

No credit checks means everyone is welcome. Financial history shouldn't limit connectivity.

0 credit score required

Simplicity

Two plans, honest pricing, no surprises. Transparent service without the fine print.

2 straightforward plans
The Problem

Why We Started Vouch

The wireless industry has been broken for years. Major carriers prioritize profits over people, using complex pricing, hidden fees, credit checks, and long-term contracts as barriers to service.

Millions of Americans struggle to get connected—not because they can't afford service, but because the system wasn't designed for them.

We saw an opportunity to do things differently. By partnering with AT&T's network, we deliver the same premium coverage without the premium barriers.

"Vouch Mobile is for everyone who deserves honest, affordable wireless service—no exceptions."

The Old Way

  • Credit checks required
  • 2-year contracts
  • Hidden fees & taxes
  • Complex plan structures

The Vouch Way

  • No credit check ever
  • Cancel anytime free
  • All-inclusive pricing
  • Two simple plans
Network Partner

Powered by AT&T

Vouch Mobile service runs on AT&T's nationwide 5G network—the same towers, same coverage, same reliability. We're a trusted MVNO (Mobile Virtual Network Operator) through Reach Mobile, delivering premium service at a fraction of the price.

97% US Coverage
5G Network Access
#1 Reliability

Join the Movement

Experience wireless the way it should be—simple, affordable, and accessible to everyone.
